anime.description: Onyankopon watched over people long ago, but one day an old woman accidentally hit Onyankopon in the head with a mallet while mashing yams. Since then, Onyankopon has been nervous about greeting people directly, and so sends subordinates to speak to them and solve their problems. He will use Afrobeat and dance to help Japanese high school girls with problems such as dieting, love, and cramming for exams. Source: ANN

tag.name: dancing
tag.description: Dance is when people move their body to music. There are many kinds of dance, like ballet or waltz. Dancing can be done for fun but can be also an art.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: performance
tag.description: The song performance on stage or acting in a theatre is a central part of the character`s life in this anime type.

tag.name: the arts
tag.description: The arts represent an outlet of human expression, usually influenced by culture, and driven by human creative impulse. Major constituents of the arts include literature – including poetry, novels and short stories, and epics; performing arts – among them music, dance, and theatre; culinary arts such as baking, chocolatiering, and winemaking; media arts like photography and film, and visual arts – including drawing, painting, and sculpting. Some art forms combine a visual element with performance (e.g. film) and the written word (e.g. comics). From prehistoric cave paintings to modern day films, art serves as a vessel for storytelling and conveying mankind`s relationship with its environment. Source: Wiki

episode.title: おにゃんこポンの休日だニャ
It`s Onyankopon`s Day Off, Meow
Onyankopon no Kyuujitsu Da Nya
episode.summary: It`s Onyankopon`s day off, and to his dismay, nobody prepared any food for him. Then, to make matter worse, Onyankopon finds out that someone`s been rating his dances! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勉強なんかしたくないだニャ
I Don`t Want to Study, Meow
Benkyou Nanka Shitakunai Da Nya
episode.summary: The four friends are commiserating over all sorts of quirky things that happen to them. Then they finally arrive at the dreaded topic of the upcoming test that they all wish would just disappear... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おまじない大好きだニャ
I Love Good Luck Charms, Meow
Omajinai Daisuki Da Nya
episode.summary: The four friends are having a heated discussion on how to make your crush notice you. Meanwhile, the rabbit in the Onyankopon temple is really energetic for some reason... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カワイイって最高だニャ
Cute Is Best, Meow
Kawaiitte Saikou Da Nya
episode.summary: The school cultural festival is coming up, and the girls can’t figure out what to wear or dance. Onyankopon to the rescue! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
またまた おにゃんこポンの休日だニャ
It`s Onyankopon`s Day Off Again, Meow
Matamata Onyankopon no Kyuujitsu Da Nya
episode.summary: Onyankopon-sama`s checking out the classroom that the girls always hang out in. But then an insolent human dares to treat the great Onyankopon-sama like this?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒマな時間ってどうすごす? だニャ
How to Spend Free Time? Meow
Hima na Jikantte Dou Sugosu? Da Nya
episode.summary: What to do you do when you have too much free time? Let`s find out what the girls do. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あたしの大草原だニャ
This Is My Prairie, Meow
Atashi no Daisougen Da Nya
episode.summary: High school girls have a green thumb but Onyankopon-sama`s too busy for that because his game is buggy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小顔に写るんですだニャ
It`ll Make Your Face Smaller, Meow
Kogao ni Utsurundesu Da Nya
episode.summary: Having a small face is important on every realm. Onyankopon-sama, please help! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 踊ればすべてが, おにゃんこポンだニャ
Everything Is Onyankopon If You Just Dance, Meow
Odoreba Subete ga, Onyankopon Da Nya
episode.summary: It`s been a long time coming, but it`s finally time for the girls` dance performance! Let`s see if all the singing and dancing with Onyankopon paid off! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊張しちゃってどうしようだニャ
What to Do About Getting Nervous, Meow
Kinchou Shichatte Dou Shiyou Da Nya
episode.summary: Even Onyankopon-sama gets nervous sometimes. But apparently writing something onto your hand and swallowing that is supposed to help. What`s exactly is one supposed to write? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 先輩むかつく~だニャ
Senpai Pisses Me Off, Meow
Senpai Mukatsukuu Da Nya
episode.summary: For some reason the girls are all annoyed and angry at all sorts of things. But then, even Onyankopon-sama is really irritable. Can the dance help them shake off their grievances? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一緒に行かないってどういうこと? だニャ
What Does It Mean If They`re Not Going Together? Meow
Issho ni Ikanaitte Dou Iu Koto? Da Nya
episode.summary: Onyankopon-sama is agonizing whether to pick the rabbit or the turtle. Meanwhile, Seri doesn`t want to come with to the bathroom. Is this the beginning of the end?! Source: crunchyroll
